Shoes.Name: Jordan 4
Shoes.Description: Iconic and timeless, the Jordan 4s blend classic design with unmatched comfort, featuring a unique mesh and leather construction. Known for its signature winged eyelets and visible Air cushioning, this model is a staple for any sneaker enthusiast.

Shoes.Name: New Balance 2002R
Shoes.Description: A rugged yet refined take on the 2002R, this model combines high-quality materials with a deconstructed aesthetic. The Protection Pack offers a unique, distressed look that merges modern streetwear style with New Balance’s famed comfort and support.

Shoes.Name: Nike Air Force 1
Shoes.Description: A streetwear legend, the Nike Air Force 1s are known for their clean lines, leather upper, and iconic Air-Sole cushioning. This shoe is versatile, stylish, and perfect for any outfit, making it a go-to choice for sneakerheads and casual wearers alike.

Shoes.Name: Dunk Low
Shoes.Description: Combining retro flair with contemporary appeal, the Nike Dunk Lows feature a low-top silhouette with durable leather and a padded collar for comfort. Originally a basketball shoe, it has evolved into an everyday essential for style-conscious individuals.

Shoes.Name: Yeezy Slide
Shoes.Description: Minimalistic and ultra-comfortable, Yeezy Slides are designed with a molded EVA foam that ensures cushioning and style. Known for their simplicity and ergonomic design, they’re perfect for both casual and upscale settings.
